Entry.JapaneseText: あちち！ 床のあちこちからなんか漏れてんぞ！？
Entry.EnglishText: Ow, crap! What the hell! There are leaks all over the floor!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>、気をつけて！ むやみにそのへん走り回ってると どんどん体力が削られちゃうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio> be careful! Running around here thoughtlessly could really hurt us!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>さん、<Dio>さん、少々よろしいですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Lord <Dio>. Lord <Dio>. May I ask a minute of your attention?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、炎嫌いなんです、弱いんです、燃えちゃうんです。 だから、もう少し、気をつけてもらえないですかね？
Entry.EnglishText: I rather dislike fire. I am quite weak to it, in fact. I can burn in it, you see. So I plead, my Lord, would you take it easy from now on?

Entry.JapaneseText: 気ぃつけても、通んなきゃ先進めねんだって！ 少し我慢しろよ、この書き割り野郎！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll be careful, fine! Just drop this formal...thing! Have some patience, you backstage prop!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬあぁぁぁあぁ！ 人が下手に出てりゃ調子に乗って！ おら、もう許せねぇだ、絶対、こいつ許せねぇだ！！
Entry.EnglishText: Uuuuurgh! I go here act all nice and ask politely but you act like the baldy brat you are! I'm not forgiving this EVER!

Entry.JapaneseText: おめぇの服だけ放り出して、ぜぇ〜んぶ燃やしてやるだ。 記録も記憶も、ぜぇ〜〜〜んぶ消し炭にしてやるだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll throw away all your clothes to the fire. All of them! Your writings, your notes, your records... They will ALL turn to cinders!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>もアルベルトさんも、やめよ、ね？ 気をつけて歩けばいいんだから
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>, Albert stop fighting will you? We just need to be careful from now on.

Entry.JapaneseText: あうあう！ <Mel><Mel>、<Mel><Mel>！ おらの事心配してくれてるぅ〜、おらも好きだどぉ！
Entry.EnglishText: Ahh! My <Mel>-<Mel>! <Mel>-<Mel>!! You really were worried about me! I really do like that about you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こいつ…… サラッとすげぇ事言いやがった……
Entry.EnglishText: This guy...jumps from formal to vulgar in a snap...
